column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Cinnabar is in need of a hand─preferably one that is armed.
Defeat the monsters swarming the crackling chasm to the northwest.
Defeat the monsters swarming the crackling chasm to the south.
Ah, excellent. Just what I need─someone who looks like they know how to kill things.
On your way here, did you happen to notice the dense pockets of lightning energy scattered around?
These areas have a tendency to attract swarms of monsters. Normally we have a hunter clear them out, but given that they're shorthanded, I should like to hire you for the task instead.
The most infested areas are in the northwest and the south. Oh, and a word of warning: try not to fall in. The tingle is most unpleasant.
The infested craters can be found to the northwest and the south. Do try to slay any monsters you find before your weapon hand goes numb, yes?
You've cleared them all out, I take it? Fantastic work.
See that there, beyond the western shore─the menacing purple glow of the upturned city? We have the Storm Surge to thank for that.
They say a wartime weapon created that gargantuan fount of lightning. And where such energy gathers, so too do monsters, tenfold.
Compared to something like that, these little chasms seem downright decorative. Still, the monsters are a hazard that cannot go unchecked. <sigh> Would that we had a more permanent solution.
Ah, but I digress. Your job here is done, and it is time you were paid for services rendered. Safe travels!
